title: New: Isles – East Hill (Demo)
content:
Yet another track from Pensacola’s Isles clearly marked as ‘DEMO’, portraying how keen the group are to not be judged on their production values, and instead on their songwriting abilities.

New track East Hill is a dreamy number, utilizing rippling guitar lines and reverb-drenched vocals to splendid effect. Whilst it’s still early in Isles’s career, it’s surely only a matter of time before they begin causing serious waves. Check out East Hill below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
